description: Updates an existing access policy that specifies an identity's access to an IoT SiteWise Monitor portal or project resource.

parameters.name: accessPolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the access policy.

parameters.name: accessPolicyIdentity
parameters.description: The identity for this access policy. Choose an IAM Identity Center user, an IAM Identity Center group, or an IAM user. user (dict) --- An IAM Identity Center user identity. The IAM Identity Center ID of the user. group (dict) --- An IAM Identity Center group identity. The IAM Identity Center ID of the group. iamUser (dict) --- An IAM user identity. The ARN of the IAM user. For more information, see IAM ARNs in the IAM User Guide. iamRole (dict) --- An IAM role identity. The ARN of the IAM role. For more information, see IAM ARNs in the IAM User Guide.

nested_params.name: user
nested_params.description: An IAM Identity Center user identity.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The IAM Identity Center ID of the user.

nested_params.name: group
nested_params.description: An IAM Identity Center group identity.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The IAM Identity Center ID of the group.

nested_params.name: arn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the IAM user. For more information, see IAM ARNs in the IAM User Guide.

nested_params.name: arn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the IAM role. For more information, see IAM ARNs in the IAM User Guide.

parameters.name: accessPolicyResource
parameters.description: The IoT SiteWise Monitor resource for this access policy. Choose either a portal or a project. portal (dict) --- A portal resource. The ID of the portal. project (dict) --- A project resource. The ID of the project.

parameters.name: accessPolicyPermission
parameters.description: The permission level for this access policy. Note that a project ADMINISTRATOR is also known as a project owner.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Don't reuse this client token if a new idempotent request is required. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
